used if we do not recognize the JSP's content type.

text" for with JSPs?

I think we just need a validator that does not validate on markup language. For that purpose, I explained "plain/text". @see Handheld Device Markup Language Specification

"StructuredTextPartitioner" if mime type is unkown type.
